name: Dodgeball Simulator
description:
Dodgeball.exe Initiated. Running Simulation . . .

Now Simulating 3 varying levels of "Dodgeball".

------------------------------------------------------------

Dodgeball Simulator is a top-down simulation game developed for Minijam 97: Simulation with the limitation of Movement is Lethal.

Thanks to everyone that supported me over on twitch and twitter throughout the chaotic development of this game. Also thanks to everyone that plays the game and has a good time.

Have a good one!

Special Thanks to the beta-testers!:

  • Shadowcharmingfox
  • Charmie10
  • Brandon
  • Kiddlazy

All Music by OneManSymphony: https://onemansymphony.bandcamp.com/
